extends FCAdapter<T>
implements ItemTouchHelperCallBack.AdapterCallBack, SwipeItemMangerInterface, SwipeAdapterInterface

      • bindData

        protected void bindData(FCViewHolder holder,
                        T item)
        从类复制的说明: FCAdapter
        Implement this method and use the holder to adapt the view to the given item.
        指定者:
        bindData 在类中 FCAdapter<T>
        参数:
        holder - A fully initialized holder.
        item - The item that needs to be displayed.

      • isLongPressDragEnabled

        public boolean isLongPressDragEnabled()
        Returns whether ItemTouchHelper should start a drag and drop operation if an item is long pressed.

        Default value is false.

        返回:
        true if ItemTouchHelper should start dragging an item when it is long pressed, false otherwise. Default value is false.
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0.0-b1

      • setLongPressDragEnabled

        public final void setLongPressDragEnabled(boolean longPressDragEnabled)
        Enable the Drag on LongPress on the entire ViewHolder.

        NOTE: This will skip LongClick on the view in order to handle the LongPress, however the LongClick listener will be called if necessary in the new Default value is false.

        参数:
        longPressDragEnabled - true to activate, false otherwise
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0.0-b1

      • isSwipeEnabled

        public final boolean isSwipeEnabled()
        Returns whether ItemTouchHelper should start a swipe operation if a pointer is swiped over the View.

        Default value is false.

        返回:
        true if ItemTouchHelper should start swiping an item when user swipes a pointer over the View, false otherwise. Default value is false.
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0.0-b1

      • setItemViewSwipeEnabled

        public final void setItemViewSwipeEnabled(boolean swipeEnabled)
        Enable the Full Swipe of the items.

        Default value is false.

        参数:
        swipeEnabled - true to activate, false otherwise
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0.0-b1

      • onItemMove

        public boolean onItemMove(int fromPosition,
                          int toPosition)
        从接口复制的说明: ItemTouchHelperCallBack.AdapterCallBack
        Called when an item has been dragged far enough to trigger a move. This is called every time an item is shifted, and not at the end of a "drop" event.

        Implementations should call RecyclerView.Adapter#notifyItemMoved(int, int) after adjusting the underlying data to reflect this move.
        指定者:
        onItemMove 在接口中 ItemTouchHelperCallBack.AdapterCallBack
        参数:
        fromPosition - The start position of the moved item.
        toPosition - Then resolved position of the moved item.
        返回:
        True if the item was moved to the new adapter position.
        另请参阅:
        RecyclerView#getAdapterPositionFor(RecyclerView.ViewHolder), RecyclerView.ViewHolder#getAdapterPosition()

      • onItemDismiss

        public void onItemDismiss(int position)
        从接口复制的说明: ItemTouchHelperCallBack.AdapterCallBack
        Called when an item has been dismissed by a swipe.

        Implementations should call RecyclerView.Adapter#notifyItemRemoved(int) after adjusting the underlying data to reflect this removal.
        指定者:
        onItemDismiss 在接口中 ItemTouchHelperCallBack.AdapterCallBack
        参数:
        position - The position of the item dismissed.
        另请参阅:
        RecyclerView#getAdapterPositionFor(RecyclerView.ViewHolder), RecyclerView.ViewHolder#getAdapterPosition()
